com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.fieldtext

Class FieldTextWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.fieldtext.AbstractFieldText
      • com.hp.autonomy.aci.content.fieldtext.FieldTextWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FieldText

    public final class FieldTextWrapper
extends AbstractFieldText
    The FieldTextWrapper class makes an immutable copy of another FieldText object. Though the classes representing specifiers in this package are already immutable, FieldTextBuilder is not and in general FieldText implementations are not obliged to be immutable. A FieldTextWrapper instance is not backed by the original object, a copy of its size and string representation are taken. Objects that are not FieldText instances can also be wrapped, assuming that their toString() methods return a fieldtext expression.

    • Constructor Summary

      FieldTextWrapper(Object fieldText)
      Though primarily intended for converting a String representation of fieldtext into genuine a FieldText object, any object may be used with a suitable toString() implementation.
      FieldTextWrapper(Object fieldText, int size)
      Though primarily intended for converting a String representation of fieldtext into genuine a FieldText object, any object may be used with a suitable toString() implementation.

      String toString()

    • Constructor Detail

      • FieldTextWrapper

        public FieldTextWrapper(FieldText fieldText)
        Creates an immutable copy of the specified FieldText object. The copy is not backed by the original object.
        Parameters:
        fieldText - The object to copy. Must be non-null.

      • FieldTextWrapper

        public FieldTextWrapper(Object fieldText)
        Though primarily intended for converting a String representation of fieldtext into genuine a FieldText object, any object may be used with a suitable toString() implementation. A suitable size will be assigned though it may not accurately reflect the actual size of the fieldtext expression.
        Parameters:
        fieldText - The object to wrap. Must be non-null.

      • FieldTextWrapper

        public FieldTextWrapper(Object fieldText,
                        int size)
        Though primarily intended for converting a String representation of fieldtext into genuine a FieldText object, any object may be used with a suitable toString() implementation.
        Parameters:
        fieldText - The object to wrap. Must be non-null.
        size - The size of the FieldTextWrapper. Must be non-negative.

    • Method Detail

      • size

        public int size()
        Description copied from interface: FieldText
        The size is defined as the number of specifiers in the FieldText expression. An individual specifier would have a size of 1.
        Returns:
        The size of the expression.

        public String toString()
